lines.text: "I have but one life to give... and that is to the Sea." -"Calico" Jack Ransom, Priveteer 1720 A.D.
Good morning, Captain. Did you sleep well?

We left Calegos knowing full well the prince would send more bounty hunters. Two months later we landed at Madagascar, the pirates' haven. Rachel and I left our pasts behind and started a new life together. Our ultimate conquest was found. Freedom.
